prop.name: SubMenuExisting
prop.p: This property becomes true when there is a menu attached to this button.

prop.name: SubMenuOpening
prop.p: This property becomes true when the attached menu is opened.

prop.name: LargeImage
prop.p:
This property defines the large icon for this button. Typically it is used in:
<RibbonLargeButton/>
<RibbonLargeDropdownButton/>
<RibbonLargeSplitButton/>

prop.name: Image
prop.p:
This property defines the small icon for this button. Typically it is used in:
<MenuItemButton/>
<ToolstripButton/>
<ToolstripDropdownButton/>
<ToolstripSplitButton/>
<RibbonSmallButton/>
<RibbonSmallDropdownButton/>
<RibbonSmallSplitButton/>

prop.name: ShortcutText
prop.p: This property defines the text representation of the shortcut key for this button.

prop.name: SubMenuTemplate
prop.p: This property defines the control template for the attached menu. If it is empty, the attached menu will use the Menu theme, unless a control template is manually assigned to the menu.

prop.name: SubMenuHost
prop.p: This property defines the control for the menu. If it is null, the host control is the button itself.
Typically for all kinds of split buttons, the host control is the embedded button that opens the menu. This property is recommended not to set for all other kinds of buttons.
